title: Being In Touch with Autism
cleaned_text: Being In Touch with Autism Inspired by the series Touch, Joseph Cubells, MD, PhD, discusses how parents and family members of autistic children can communicate and show affection by embracing the child's interests. About Dr. Cubells Dr. Cubells is Director of Medical and Adult Services at the Emory Autism Center, and associate professor in Emory's Department of Psychiatry and Behavioral Sciences and the Department of Human Genetics..
